En: Blessings rain down from the heavens fully <color=green>restoring</color> your <color=green>health</color>.

Ko: 생명의 힘이 담긴 강건의 룬을 흡수하여 <color=green>최대체력</color>을<color=green>15</color>만큼 늘린다.
En: Absorb the Rune of Vitality imbued with the power of life increasing your <color=green>maximum health</color> by <color=green>15</color>.

Ko: 대마법사 루프스의 힘이 담긴 루프스의 룬을 흡수하여 <color=blue>쿨타임 감소를</color>을 <color=blue>15</color>만큼 늘린다.
En: Absorb the Rune of Lupus infused with the wisdom of the Great Sage Lupus increasing <color=blue>cooldown reduction</color> by <color=blue>15</color>.

Ko: 광룡의 힘이 담긴 광폭의 룬을 흡수하여 <color=red>기본 공력력</color>을 <color=red>5</color>만큼 늘린다.
En: Absorb the Rune of Fury imbued with the power of the Raged Dragon increasing your <color=red>base attack power</color> by <color=red>5</color>.
